interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Emilia Hypoallergenic Baby Lotion - Quick-Absorbing, Non-Greasy, Alcohol-Free Baby Body Oatmeal Cream With Natural Colloidal Oatmeal for Dry Skin Eczema - Provides 24 Hour Moisturization - 8.8 fl.oz.
Review Date: 2020/09/15
Store: Emilia
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Emilia', 'Item Form': 'Lotion', 'Unit Count': '8.8 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '7.32 x 2.52 x 2.24 inches; 10.12 Ounces'}
Review Text: Emilia Baby Body Lotion will really make your skin as soft as your babies! I just had to try it on myself because I have eczema and they said it is hypoallergenic. I can tell you that it doesn't irritate my skin ad the softness is really noticeable...and that you might not be able to notice on your baby because a babies skin is (usually) already soft. I am an adult that has allergies to a lot of things that show up in skin irritations, and I do not think that you can go wrong with buying this lotion. This is a great one for your newborn, baby, and the whole family. The only con would be if you don't like the smell of baby powder. It smells like a creamy baby powder, and I like it.
Review Title: What a difference in softness!
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

Emilia Baby Body Lotion will really make your skin as soft as your babies! I just had to try it on myself because I have eczema and they said it is hypoallergenic. I can tell you that it doesn't irritate my skin ad the softness is really noticeable...and that you might not be able to notice on your baby because a babies skin is (usually) already soft. I am an adult that has allergies to a lot of things that show up in skin irritations, and I do not think that you can go wrong with buying this lotion. This is a great one for your newborn, baby, and the whole family. The only con would be if you don't like the smell of baby powder. It smells like a creamy baby powder, and I like it.
What a difference in softness!
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Skin Sensitivity:** User has sensitive skin and experiences eczema, indicating a preference for hypoallergenic and gentle skincare products suitable for both themselves and their family.
  
- **Family-Centric Choices:** Purchases reflect a focus on products that are safe for newborns and babies, suggesting a strong consideration for family-oriented needs in their skincare selections.
  
- **Effectiveness Over Brand Preference:** User values the effectiveness of products, emphasizing noticeable results in skin softness rather than brand loyalty. They involve themselves in trying products that are typically marketed for infants.
  
- **Scent Consideration:** The user is receptive to specific scents, as they appreciate a creamy baby powder fragrance, which indicates they enjoy pleasant, mild aromas in skincare products.
  
- **Positive Reviews:** Exhibits a trend of giving high ratings when personal needs are met satisfactorily, particularly when addressing skin issues. 

Overall, the user prioritizes gentle, effective, family-friendly skincare solutions tailored to sensitive skin needs.
